TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogEntryCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 定义 实例集合的大小和枚举数。

span.span: Defines size and enumerators for a collection of instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类读取与关联的数据项时实例。Use the class when reading the entries associated with an instance. 属性类是在事件日志中的所有项的集合。The property of the class is a collection of all the entries in the event log. 因为新的项追加到现有列表中，逐项通过集合使您可以访问在最初创建后创建的条目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . 但是，您查看的整个列表后，它将不使用更新新条目。However, after you view the entire list, it is not updated with new entries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取事件日志信息从对象。The following example demonstrates how to obtain event log information from an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/CPP/eventlogentry_copyto.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/CS/eventlogentry_copyto.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/VB/eventlogentry_copyto.vb#1)]

param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 从特定的数组索引开始，将 的元素复制到 实例的数组。

span.span: Copies the elements of the to an array of instances, starting at a particular array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为新的项追加到现有列表中，逐项通过集合使您可以访问在最初创建后创建的条目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . 数组实例在实例化时已固定。An array of instances is fixed at the time it is instantiated. 因此，使用返回的数组不能读取新条目方法。Therefore, you cannot read new entries by using the array that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建数组并使用方法的内容复制到其中。The following example creates an array and uses the method to copy the contents of an into it. [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/CS/eventlogentry_copyto.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/VB/eventlogentry_copyto.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取事件日志中的项数（即 集合中的元素个数）。

span.span: Gets the number of entries in the event log (that is, the number of elements in the collection).

value.span: 当前在事件日志中的项数。

span.span: The number of entries currently in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示日志中的所有条目的动态列表。An represents a dynamic list of all the entries in a log. 因此，属性可以更改的生命周期内你创建的实例。Therefore, the property can change during the lifetime of the instance that you create. 通常，最好使用而将其值赋给变量不是直接的属性。It is usually best to work with the property directly instead of assigning its value to a variable. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来循环访问对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to iterate through an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CPP/eventlogentry_item.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CS/eventlogentry_item.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/VB/eventlogentry_item.vb#1)]

summary.span: 支持在 对象上进行简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over the object.

returns.span: 可用于在集合上进行迭代的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate over the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过返回的对象方法是包装器类，该类实现枚举器。The object that is returned by the method is a wrapper for the class that implements the enumerator. > [!NOTE] > 如果在集合更改在迭代过程中，则终止迭代。If the collection is changed during the iteration, the iteration is terminated. 若要避免可能出现此问题，请参阅另一种方法来循环访问集合的属性。To avoid this possibility, see the property for an alternative technique for iterating through a collection.

Default Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As EventLogEntry

param.name: index
param.span: 与事件日志项关联的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index that is associated with the event log entry.

summary.span: 基于从 0（零）开始的索引，获取事件日志中的项。

span.span: Gets an entry in the event log, based on an index that starts at 0 (zero).

value.span: 位于 参数所指定的位置的事件日志项。

span.span: The event log entry at the location that is specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象由事件日志系统根据到达事件日志的时间顺序进行索引。 objects are indexed by the event log system according to the chronological order in which they arrived in the event log. 使用属性以选择特定的事件日志条目已知其集合中的索引。Use the property to select a specific event log entry whose index in the collection is known. 循环访问实例将逐个讲解按顺序对象。Iterating through the instance steps through each object sequentially. 集合是动态的并且当你输入循环时可能为不可变的条目数。The collection is dynamic and the number of entries may not be immutable when you enter the loop. 因此，应使用`for each...next`而不是循环`for(int i=0; i实例检查整套条目。Therefore, you should use a `for each...next` loop instead of a `for(int i=0; i instance to examine the entire set of entries. 因为新的项追加到现有列表中，逐项通过集合使您可以访问在最初创建后创建的条目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示中的项的信息对象。The following example demonstrates how to display information for the items in an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CPP/eventlogentry_item.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CS/eventlogentry_item.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/VB/eventlogentry_item.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法类复制到的集合的全部或部分数组。Use the method of the class to copy all or part of the collection to an array.
